greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: (Sum of the quadratic nonresidues of prime(n)) - (sum of the quadratic residues of prime(n)).
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Christian Aebi and Grant Cairns, Sums of Quadratic residues and nonresidues, arXiv preprint arXiv:1512.00896 [math.NT] (2015).
maple: for j from 1 to p-1 do
if legendre(j,p)=1 then sp:=sp+j; else sm:=sm+j; fi; od;
program: (PARI) a(n) = my (p=prime(n)); return (sum(i=1, p-1, if (kronecker(i,p)==1, -i, +i))) \\ _Rémy Sigrist_, Apr 28 2017
xref: Sums of residues, nonresidues, and their differences, for p == 1 mod 4, p == 3 mod 4, and all p: A171555; A282035, A282036, A282037; A076409, A125615, A282038.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 20 2017
